goal.description: Improve client engagement and streamline post-project support systems for Precision Solutions by April 2024.

subPlans.justification: To enhance customer satisfaction and strengthen long-term business relationships while reflecting Charles' value of continuous improvement.

actionItems.what: Conduct a comprehensive analysis of current client engagement practices and identify key areas for improvement.
Develop a detailed plan for post-project support enhancements, including automation of follow-ups.
Implement training sessions for the team on the new engagement and support systems.

goal.description: Reduce client onboarding time by 75% by April 2024.

subPlans.justification: To increase operational efficiency and enhance customer experience, aligning with Charles' value of precision in execution.

actionItems.what: Map out the existing client onboarding process and identify bottlenecks.
Design and test streamlined onboarding procedures with a focus on automation.
Roll out the new onboarding protocol and monitor its impact.

goal.description: Achieve a 20% increase in client retention by October 2024.

subPlans.justification: To boost business growth and ensure sustainable success, leveraging Charles' analytical thinking and decision-making skills.

actionItems.what: Analyze client feedback and identify key retention factors.
Develop and implement new client retention strategies, such as loyalty programs.
Evaluate retention strategy effectiveness quarterly and adjust accordingly.
actionItems.when: Quarterly, first Monday of the month, 2 PM - 3 PM

goal.description: Complete Lean Six Sigma Black Belt certification by September 2025.

subPlans.justification: To enhance Charles' strategic foresight and operational expertise consistent with his goal-oriented personality.

actionItems.what: Enroll in a Lean Six Sigma Black Belt certification course.
Dedicate time for study and practice exams.
actionItems.when: Twice a week, Thursday and Saturday, 8 PM - 10 PM

actionItems.what: Participate in relevant projects to apply Lean Six Sigma principles.

goal.description: Host the first leadership workshop by June 2025.

subPlans.justification: To share knowledge and mentor emerging leaders, aligning with Charles' interest in mentoring and community impact.

actionItems.what: Research and outline key topics for the workshop.
Identify and collaborate with industry experts for guest speaking engagements.
actionItems.when: Monthly, second Tuesday of the month, 1 PM - 2 PM

actionItems.what: Organize and market the workshop to a targeted audience.
actionItems.when: Starting January 2025, bi-weekly on Thursdays, 3 PM - 4 PM
